itca.compute_y_dist¶

itca.compute_y_dist(y)¶

Compute the distribution of labels

Parameters

y (numpy array) – Class labels vector whose values range from 0 to K - 1

Returns

A dictionary whose keys indicate the class labels and values indicate the corresponding proportions.

Return type

dict
